name: RoboPG
description:
RoboPG is a Teambuilding RPG in which players build their allies to fight and collect parts. BATTLE!  

Fight other robots and test your robot’s strength in battle!

LOOT!  

Take their parts to power up your own robots!

UPGRADE!  

Attach your new parts to your robots!

BUILD!  

Edit and Customize your robots so you look cool!
